data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Zheng-Xiang (2016): New replacement name for Chrysotusinfirmus Wei, Zhang & Zhou, 2014 (Diptera, Dolichopodidae, Diaphorinae). ZooKeys 607: 145-146, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.607.9543, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.607.9543
